quests.welcomeMsg: The message (at NPC site) when the quest is triggered
quests.objectiveMsg: Plain quest description for Quests overview
quests.completedMsg: Message displayed immediately after the quest is completed (optional)
quests.finishedMsg: Message displayed when returned to the quest issuer (optional)

quests.welcomeMsg:
Hello there, I will teach you the basics.
Follow my instructions and you will be fine.
quests.completedMsg: OK lad, use 'w' or space to jump and 'a', 'd' to move!
quests.finishedMsg: Now jump on that big box.

quests.welcomeMsg: Now jump on that big box.
quests.objectiveMsg: Jump on the box to your right.
quests.completedMsg:
Excellent! To run hold shift.
If running you can jump much higher and longer!

quests.welcomeMsg: Now run to the exit sign on the east!
quests.objectiveMsg: Go to the exit sign on the east.
quests.finishedMsg:
Listen up lad, you did well...for a n00b.
The time is running out.Now hurry to the white castle. The real adventure merely begins!

quests.welcomeMsg: You shall not pass...unless you bring me knowledge of Kendo!
quests.finishedMsg:
What? Could it be?
You must be the chosen one! Proceed now.

quests.welcomeMsg:
Find Hanshi - the great Kendo master, he will train you.
His dojo is on the east. Beware of magic slimes!
quests.objectiveMsg: Find the Kendo master in his dojo on the east.

quests.welcomeMsg:
I expected you, we must hurry! Your first lesson will be the jump attack.
Jump on the enemy and press 's'. Collect 10 ki from magic slimes!
quests.objectiveMsg:
Collect 10 Ki from magic slimes.
Attack with: Jump + 's'
quests.completedMsg:
Quest completed!
Hurry back to the dojo!

quests.welcomeMsg:
You show no potential...I saw little girls performing better.
Still, lets practice some more.
quests.objectiveMsg:
Collect 15 Ki from magic slimes.
Attack with: Jump + 's'
quests.completedMsg:
Quest completed!
Hurry back to the dojo!
